channel.title: Arcade on Game Vibe
channel.description: Recent content in Arcade on Game Vibe

item.title: Realm Racer
item.description: Game Description Realm Racer is an arcade racing project, the main goal of which is to find the ideal trajectory to achieve the maximum number of points. The process of passing is complicated by extraordinary routes that run through many eras and various biomes. The key element of the gameplay is a constantly running engine, which completely eliminates the possibility of stopping. Navigating through locations requires sharp reactions and skill to overcome all physical obstacles on the way to the finish line.

item.title: The Last Ninja Collection + Bonus Games
item.description: Game Description The Last Ninja Collection and Bonus Games - the final confrontation between the ninja Armakuni and the sinister shogun Kunitoki takes place within the walls of an ancient Tibetan temple. The path to the main enemy runs through five halls, each of which is subordinate to its own element. Overcoming these challenges requires not only combat skills, but also ingenuity to solve puzzles and find sacred scrolls. The combat system rewards skill through Bushido mechanics, increasing the effectiveness of a warrior fighting unarmed or using the same type of weapon as his opponent.

item.title: Terminator 2D: NO FATE
item.description: Game Description Terminator 2D: NO FATE is an arcade action game, the plot of which is based on the events of the cult sci-fi action film, offering to relive iconic episodes in a 2D side-scroller format. Gamers take control of characters such as Sarah Connor and T-800, who will have to thwart the plans of Skynet’s artificial intelligence. The main enemy is the invulnerable T-1000, and the main task is to prevent the total destruction of humanity in the coming war.

item.title: I Sell Lemonade
item.description: Game Description I Sell Lemonade is a story about a 1980s summer spent on the sidewalk with a pitcher of soft drink. At the center of the story is a 10-year-old child who, after his father sells his gaming console, is forced to look for something to do on the street. An activity initially conceived as a way to pass the time gradually turns into an extended journey through childhood experiences, friendships and character formation.

item.title: Mutant Football League 2
item.description: Game Description Mutant Football League 2 is a brutal arcade reimagining of American football, where athletes are replaced by teams of orcs, skeletons and deadly robots. The project is an ideological continuation of the cult classic, relying not on realism, but on dark humor and spectacular matches in the 8 vs 8 format. Each arena is a high-danger zone filled with circular saws, mines and other deadly traps. Unpredictability is also introduced by sudden events that can radically change the balance of power during the competition.

item.title: NeverAwake FLASHBACK
item.description: Game Description Delving into the surreal world of subconscious nightmares, NeverAwake FLASHBACK offers a confrontation with distorted childhood memories. The project’s universe is filled with grotesque opponents, which are materialized phobias. The monsters are not demons, but hated vegetables, frightening dentists and other traumatic images from the past of the young heroine named Rem. On this dangerous journey through the recesses of consciousness, she is accompanied by her faithful plush companion Gabe-chan.

item.title: Simogo Legacy Collection
item.description: Game Description Simogo Legacy Collection is an anthology of 7 classic projects, representing an eclectic collection of works from the past. In addition to the main works, the publication is supplemented by an extensive archive of rare materials. Among them you can find a digital book, an audio drama in podcast format, as well as previously unreleased musical compositions. Of particular interest are game prototypes and interactive storytelling, which allow you to look at the creative process from the inside.

item.title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion
item.description: Game Description MARVEL Cosmic Invasion is a side-scrolling beat ‘em up focused on interstellar conflict. The player will have to choose from 15 heroes to confront the Annihilation Wave, a force threatening the galaxy under the leadership of Annihilus. The story takes place in a variety of locations, starting on Earth, such as New York, and extending into space, including the Negative Zone. Figures like Nova, Spider-Man, Wolverine, Phyla-Vell and Captain America are among the available protagonists to join the efforts against this galactic menace.

item.title: Death In Abyss
item.description: Game Description Death In Abyss becomes a real test of strength for connoisseurs of intense shooters, because the project requires honed reflexes and virtuoso control of the combat apparatus. The flight system is designed for the fast maneuvers, including evasive maneuvers and sharp turns, needed to survive high-dynamic collision environments. Confrontation with hostile life forms is based on the use of a powerful arsenal. Each successful elimination of an enemy allows you to absorb his vital energy to restore your own reserve of strength, which forces you to constantly be on the move and conduct an aggressive battle.

item.title: Super Cabbage Kabumi
item.description: Game Description Super Cabbage Kabumi is a roguelike game that focuses on creating unique builds of items and pets for maximum efficiency. The central element of the gameplay is the process of collecting artifacts, whose properties can be combined to produce unpredictable and powerful effects. Unlockable companions have a significant impact on the passage. These creatures have unique abilities that can, for example, modify the speed of a projectile or change the reaction of targets to interaction.

item.title: GLONK
item.description: Game Description GLONK is an incremental project in which the entire gameplay is built around feeding the creature of the same name. The central task is to constantly provide the pet with food for its subsequent increase in size, which directly affects financial well-being. The viability and continuous growth of the ward is the only source of income, so maintaining his health becomes a paramount task for accumulating gold. Successfully nurturing one creature opens up the opportunity to have several more, thereby scaling up profits and accelerating advancement to new levels.

item.title: Social Soccer Champions
item.description: Game Description Sociable Soccer Champions is a fast-paced take on competitive soccer with fast-paced arcade gameplay at its core. Controls are intuitive, but mastery will require some practice. The arsenal of techniques includes powerful shots with spin on the ball, as well as acceleration and energy consumption systems. The key element is to build your own roster from an extensive database of over 14,000 licensed FIFPRO professionals. Each player card has unique attributes, allowing you to create tactically flexible teams to achieve victories.

item.title: Bubble Bobble Sugar Dungeons
item.description: Game Description Bubble Bobble Sugar Dungeons is a colorful adventure with roguelike elements set in a whimsical world made entirely of sweets. The gameplay revolves around exploring ever-changing dungeons and castles filled with dessert-shaped enemies. From the treasures found, special ingredients are obtained that are necessary to enhance the abilities of the main character. Repeated completion of levels allows you to accumulate resources for learning new skills, opening access to previously inaccessible areas.

item.title: Street Racer Collection (QUByte Classics)
item.description: Game Description Street Racer Collection (QUByte Classics) is a hybrid of arcade racing and combat competitions, where reaching the finish line is just one part of success. The main way to interact with opponents is not just overtaking, but direct physical elimination using special techniques. You can control a dozen colorful pilots, each of whom has a vehicle with unique attack capabilities. Competitions take place on routes full of dangers, running through both recognizable landmarks and completely fantastic areas.

item.title: AFTERBLAST
item.description: Game Description AFTERBLAST is a fast-paced first-person shooter with rogue-lite elements that takes you on an epic journey across a devastated planet. As you progress through randomly generated dungeons, you’ll encounter hordes of monsters and bosses, and you’ll need dozens of guns and other weapons to defeat them. In this world, chaos came without warning and wreaked havoc on the once beautiful planet of Aryasan. The skies dimmed, the vegetation withered, and animals began to attack each other as resources dried up.

item.title: Daisen
item.description: Game Description Daisen is a fast-paced first-person shooter that tells the story of the fate of a girl who finds herself at the center of a mysterious anomaly spreading. The protagonist is Emilia Svitanko, an ordinary girl who inevitably becomes a tool for containing chaos. She will have to figure out the reasons for the anomalous influence that has engulfed the surrounding lands. A key feature of the combat system is the complete absence of ammunition and reloading.

item.title: HoloCafe
item.description: Game Description HoloCafe is a management simulator in which the player takes on the role of a manager and saves a small establishment from ruin. The plot takes place in an alternate universe, where instead of a VTuber agency, a cafe was opened, but the business quickly fell into disrepair. When the situation began to seem hopeless, virtual idols appear from a mysterious portal, ready to help restore business. The gamer has at his disposal a staff of 17 talents representing the Japanese, English and Indonesian divisions of Hololive.

item.title: Speed ​​Demons 2
item.description: Game Description Speed ​​Demons 2 is an arcade road racing game that focuses on explosive action and all-out destruction. The project offers hundreds of races, distributed across numerous chapters. A total of 10 modes are available, ranging from classic competitions with rivals to missions where the main goal is to destroy as many vehicles as possible within the allotted time. Moreover, each race is designed for quick sessions and is completed on average in 2-4 minutes, maintaining a high pace of what is happening.

item.title: ZAKO NO AHIRU
item.description: Game Description ZAKO NO AHIRU is a 2D platformer of increased difficulty, the main goal of which is to conquer an inaccessible peak to the accompaniment of caustic comments. Every action is tirelessly watched by a girl named Sugaki Mary, who lives next door. She’s ready to make a caustic remark or an inappropriate joke at any time, using an arsenal of more than 800 fully voiced lines. The reward for your patience and skill will be one of 7 endings, each of which represents a unique surreal situation, reminiscent of a dream.

item.title: Neon Inferno
item.description: Game Description Neon Inferno is a hybrid side-scroller whose gameplay is an explosive combination of 2D run-and-gun and gallery shooter. The basis of the combat system is the ability to fire at opponents who are simultaneously in the foreground and in the background. Tactical depth is provided by the Bullet Time mechanic, which allows you to deflect enemy projectiles, as well as the ability to hijack vehicles to pursue targets.

item.title: BIRDCAGE
item.description: Game Description BIRDCAGE is a fast-paced bullet hell shooter where gameplay focuses on unique sword mechanics to fend off attacks and destroy enemies. The project takes inspiration from the arcade classics of the 90s, offering a polished combat system and stylized graphics. The pilot is required not only to dodge hundreds of projectiles, but also to actively use the blade to break through enemy squadrons. The title requires high concentration and sharp reflexes to survive in the chaos of battles.

item.title: Sektori
item.description: Game Description Sektori is an intense twin-stick shooter whose gameplay is inextricably linked to the aggressive rhythms of techno music and requires extreme concentration from the player. The project immerses you in a state of flow, where kaleidoscopic visuals, soundtrack and gameplay merge into one. The main task is to destroy a myriad of opponents in a constantly transforming arena. The battlefield dynamically changes its shape, expanding, contracting or even splitting into several parts, which forces you to constantly adapt battle tactics and does not allow you to rely on memorized patterns.

item.title: SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide
item.description: Game Description SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide is a platformer that takes players on a new ghostly adventure through a beloved underwater world. The basis of the gameplay was the ability to instantly change the controlled character, choosing between SpongeBob and Patrick, in order to jointly use their unique acrobatic talents to deal with puzzles and obstacles. Special mention goes to Patrick, whose moveset has been expanded to include the ability to burrow into the ground or cling to ledges with a grappling hook.

item.title: Claire a la Mode
item.description: Game Description Claire a la Mode is a global pastry tournament where not only the prestigious title of best baker, but also the fate of an entire city is at stake. This grand competition is marred by the presence of dishonest participants who seek to falsify the final results. At the head of the conspiracy is the insidious Queen Bee, whose numerous henchmen are actively trying to interfere with honest confectioners.

item.title: Shelldiver
item.description: Game Description Shelldiver immerses you in exploring a vast ocean filled with unique biomes, from volcanic waters to crystalline caves. Instead of linear development, a branched skill tree is offered, which allows you to customize expeditions in detail to suit your own style of passage, focusing on the speed of collection or the depth of research. All these improvements serve one purpose - the development of an unusual business founded by an elderly turtle.

item.title: Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite
item.description: Game Description Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite, a retro-stylized roguelike shooter that immerses you in the atmosphere of classic arcade games and invites you to take control of a spaceship to clear endless asteroid fields. The main task is to methodically destroy waves of space debris filling hostile space. Gamers will have to not only dodge countless threats, but also conduct targeted fire, turning chaotic clusters into valuable resources for further development.

item.title: CLAWPUNK
item.description: Game Description CLAWPUNK, a 2D action-platformer with roglite elements, takes you to a dystopian city overrun by hostile factions and street gangs. The main goal is to recapture the metropolis from a tyrant named Mister Fluffy, a former ally who betrayed his relatives and expelled all the cats. The liberation mission falls on the shoulders of a squad of 9 unique cat heroes with a total of 9 lives per playthrough.

item.title: SCHROTT
item.description: Game Description SCHROTT is a roguelike racing game where performing crazy stunts and collecting valuable loot provide the basis for deep vehicle customization. Instead of ordinary machines, there are absurd designs that lend themselves to all sorts of improvements to wreak even more chaos. Each race turns into a hunt for resources that allow you to turn your car into a unique weapon of destruction on the road. Arcade controls make the gameplay accessible and intuitive from the first minutes, and high-speed action does not let you relax.

item.title: Soba's Gunpaw
item.description: Game Description Sobas Gunpaw is a dynamic action game in the style of Bullet Heaven, where survival directly depends on the constant and systematic strengthening of the protagonist. At the heart of it all is an extensive skill system that provides access to numerous character upgrades. The progression process is built on the cyclical destruction of everything on the screen, which allows you to accumulate valuable assets. It is these materials collected from defeated enemies that open new branches in the branched tree of talents.

item.title: DEFRAG
item.description: Game Description DEFRAG becomes a real optimization test for the gamer, since the project requires a careful approach to creating an effective system. The goal is to eliminate digital viruses that have infected system sectors. To achieve success, you will have to collect the resources necessary to strengthen the nodes. Combining these elements allows you to discover new fighting styles, which adds variety to the passage. The effectiveness of weapons is customized using special modules that form the basis for unique assemblies.

item.title: Duncrush
item.description: Game Description Duncrush is a role-playing clicker game where the depth of character development is achieved through a well-developed skill tree and unique equipment. Creating your own strategy becomes possible thanks to powerful blades, shields and accessories found in battle. All this equipment is necessary to strengthen the hero, preparing to meet stronger opponents. Exploring numerous dungeons, each with unique challenges and rewards, forms the core of the gameplay. In these dangerous journeys, the protagonist is helped by mercenaries who fight shoulder to shoulder.

item.title: NASCAR 25
item.description: Game Description NASCAR 25 takes you through the challenging journey from novice to motorsport legend. His career starts in a modest home garage, where he will prepare his first car for races in the ARCA Menards series. Gradually moving up the racing hierarchy, it will be possible to conquer the NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series, Xfinity Series championships and, finally, fight for the main cup. Success depends not only on skill on the track, but also on strategic decisions: hiring personnel, finding sponsors and developing new parts for the car, building its reputation through results and communication with the press.

item.title: Cyber ​​Shard Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cyber ​​Shard Clicker is an incremental project that focuses on strategic development and constant enhancement of hacking capabilities. The central element of the entire progression system is a branched skill tree, offering tactical choices between immediate improvements and permanent bonuses. The latter guarantee a significant advantage in future hacking attempts. The resource for acquiring new skills are data fragments obtained in the process of destroying geometric defense systems. Each click turns into a pulse of digital destruction, aimed at destroying enemy polygonal shields, cubic guards and triangular drones.

item.title: Let Them Come: Onslaught
item.description: Game Description Let Them Come: Onslaught is the epitome of cinematic chaos as high-tech drones and deadly orbital lasers rain down on the enemy, accompanied by vibrant retro-pixelated visuals. The weapon fires automatically, allowing you to fully focus on tactical maneuvers and choosing upgrades in real time. Survival on a hostile planet infested with alien horrors becomes a real challenge. Endless waves of xenomorphs and giant bosses constantly test reflexes and the ability to adapt to the dangers of procedurally generated arenas inspired by 80s sci-fi action films.

item.title: Lumines Arise
item.description: Game Description Lumines Arise is a reimagining of the classic puzzle game from the studio Enhance, known for the Tetris Effect: Connected project. Temporarily stopping field clearing with the new Burst mechanic opens up tactical depth, allowing you to build huge formations for record-breaking scores. This approach turns each playthrough into a unique audiovisual experience, where actions directly affect the environment and soundtrack. The concept of synesthesia, laid down by the developers, is felt in every element, linking together light, sound and interaction.

item.title: Swords and Sandals 3 Redux
item.description: Game Description Swords and Sandals 3 Redux plunges fighters into a world of merciless combat, where cutting off limbs does not mean inevitable defeat, but only strengthens the will to win. Turn-based battles in the Gladiae Ultratus arena, taking place both one-on-one and in teams of two, set the goal for the gladiator to defeat 24 legendary champions of the Brandor universe. The path to glory runs through seven deadly locations, from the eerie depths of the Bone Pit to the dizzying heights of the Tower of Vertigo.

item.title: King of Bones
item.description: Game Description In King of Bones, the main goal is to dominate prehistoric arenas in battles with realistic physics. The combat system conveys the weight and power of every encounter as all bites and strikes interact with physically simulated bodies in real time. Gamers dash, stomp and headbutt in fast-paced battles where creatures fight to the last. An attacking Triceratops can throw an enemy into the air, and small raptors can grab onto larger opponents right during a fight.

item.title: Nitroglycerine!
item.description: Game Description Nitroglycerine! is a test where the main task is to transport a deadly substance along difficult routes. The process of controlling a heavy tractor is subject to the laws of realistic physics, and the vehicle itself is completely unsuitable for overcoming obstacles along the way. Any mistake in piloting, sharp turn or collision can lead to the detonation of nitroglycerin and instant failure of the mission. Even climbing moderately steep slopes requires precise timing, and putting too much pressure on the engine via turbocharging risks stalling the engine.

item.title: Dragon Blazers
item.description: Game Description Adventures in Dragon Blazers take players into a fantasy setting where they have to take control of a mighty warrior. The hero masters mysterious combat techniques that will be useful in clashes against cyber ninjas. The game is made in the form of a classic arcade adventure game, drawn in retro pixel graphics. Users will wander through two-dimensional locations with a side view, encountering problems such as landscape obstacles (pits, hills, traps) and opponents.

item.title: Drill Bird
item.description: Game Description Drill Bird invites you to immerse yourself in a world where every foray underground is critical. As darkness falls, the depths become filled with danger, forcing you to rush back to the safety of your nest. This story of survival and care is told without a single word, creating a special atmosphere in which comfort is mixed with constant tension. Every decision made directly affects the outcome, because time is running out inexorably, and the creatures waiting in the darkness do not forgive mistakes, turning each expedition into a risky undertaking.

item.title: THRASHER
item.description: Game Description THRASHER is a psychedelic arcade odyssey where music, visuals and the process itself are woven into a single transcendental stream that immerses you in a state of flow. The journey takes you from primeval darkness to the heights of celestial bliss, culminating in an intense showdown with a cosmic infant deity. Control the magnificent space eel to gracefully glide and dash across stunning alien worlds in a desperate race for survival.

item.title: Click to Civ
item.description: Game Description Click to Civ is an incremental strategy game where the main goal is to help crashed aliens. The plot revolves around the emergency landing of their ship on prehistoric Earth, where the survivors find themselves surrounded by primitive tribes. The only way to return home is to accelerate the evolution of humanity, taking it from stone tools to interstellar technology. The basis of progress are special signs of civilization, obtained from the destruction of ancient monoliths.

item.title: Deep Space Exploitation
item.description: Game Description Deep Space Exploitation is a space mining simulator in which pilots have to work for a dubious corporation in the distant future. The storyline, spanning a prologue and several epilogues, challenges gamers to survive under harsh corporate oppression. The main gameplay comes down to the exploration of asteroid fields, where not only courage is required, but also extreme caution to successfully extract resources. Every decision made directly affects the further development of events and the ability to secure a decent future for oneself.

item.title: Silly Survivors
item.description: Game Description Silly Survivors is a casual action game in which the protagonist will have to repel the attacks of hordes of funny ghosts. A brave fluffy fox falls under control, for which the only means of defense is an ordinary flashlight. Despite their comical appearance and ridiculous behavior, otherworldly entities pose a serious threat. They constantly try to get closer to the character in order to pull off some trick that turns out to be fatal.

item.title: Mortal Kombat: Legacy Collection
item.description: Game Description Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection collects key games from the series' inception, presented as they appeared in arcades and on home consoles. This collection contains the original arcade releases and a carefully selected selection of home system adaptations from the 1990s. The gamer selects a character from a list of fighters, each of whom is based on digitized live actors - a technique that set the initial visual style of the project.

item.title: Nuclear Gladiators 3000
item.description: Game Description Nuclear Gladiators 3000 is an opportunity to become the star of a brutal TV show, quench the thirst for spectacle of the bloodthirsty crowd and write your name in history forever. The winners will receive not only recognition, but also a place of honor in the Hall of Fame, as well as a glossy cover of Gladiators Today Magazine. These are the goals that fighters pursue in a retrofuturistic world, where survival has become the highest-rated entertainment, broadcast live for the amusement of the audience.

item.title: Silver Bullet
item.description: Game Description Silver Bullet is an arcade shooting gallery in which the protagonist will have to clear static screens from numerous waves of enemies. The famous monster hunter Van Helsing falls under the control of the gamer, who will have to go through 12 levels. The gameplay requires precise actions, since simultaneous movement and firing are not provided. To survive, you must constantly evade threats and choose the right position to attack.

item.title: Wreckreation
item.description: Game Description Users in Wreckreation will enjoy dynamic rides in racing cars, moving across vast locations. You will go out for a ride on unique tracks where there are jumps, twisted road elements and other dangerous tests. The game has a plentiful number of cars to choose from, as well as many locked cars that should be gradually unlocked as you progress through the single-player campaign. Players will have to tune their cars, changing the appearance with paint and body kits, as well as improving driving characteristics with the engine, wheels and other components.

item.title: Flappy Bat 3
item.description: Game Description Flappy Bat 3 offers an endless arcade challenge where each playthrough is unique thanks to procedurally generated obstacles. Gamers must perform precise wing flaps using a simple mouse click or gamepad tap to guide the bat through an ever-changing maze of dangers. Intense competition for the highest score unfolds on the global leaderboard, motivating you to hone your skills. The difficulty increases steadily with each level, presenting new challenges and forcing you to constantly adapt your tactics to survive.

item.title: The Horde Wants You Dead
item.description: Game Description The Horde Wants You Dead is a fast-paced top-down shooter that plunges you into a desperate fight for survival against countless hordes of enemies. The main task is to confront thousands of ruthless opponents, using an extensive arsenal and tactical maneuvers. Survivors must collect coins from defeated enemies, which are exchanged for supply crates containing character upgrades, new weapons, or increased firepower. The gameplay is based on constant movement and adaptation to different types of enemies.

item.title: OLAPU
item.description: Game Description OLAPU is a test for a well-coordinated team, challenging raid bosses whose mechanics are reminiscent of large-scale battles in MMORPGs. Defeating opponents like Guardian Seraphina or Empress Elisera will require not only perfect knowledge of attack patterns, but also impeccable coordination. Each successful foray into the Valley of Elisera is rewarded, allowing you to unlock permanent upgrades, legendary gear with semi-random stats, and even new characters for future runs.

item.title: Roulette Hero
item.description: Game Description Roulette Hero is a project in which a squad of adorable animals confronts ruthless mechanical monsters, and the outcome of the battles is decided by the rotation of the roulette. Gamers will have to form a team of various animals, each of which has unique abilities. Some companions are distinguished by their attack speed, while others create impenetrable defense. The thoughtful placement of fighters on the cells of the roulette wheel and its subsequent launch activate their skills, creating powerful combinations and synergies that can turn the tide of even the most difficult fight.

item.title: Double Dragon Revive
item.description: Game Description Double Dragon Revive is a revival of the classic series in modern 3D, where the combat system goes beyond just beating up your opponents. The outcome of the fight now depends on the ability to parry blows by performing the stunning technique Critical Assault, and on the competent use of the environment. The heroes will not only have to use their fists, but also use weapons scattered throughout the levels, from knives to hammers, and also use interactive elements of locations to gain a tactical advantage.

item.title: HYPERBEAT
item.description: Game Description HYPERBEAT is a rhythmic adventure in which the armored HYPERKNIGHT races through surreal interdimensional tunnels. Players must navigate their way through neon mazes, where every note of the original electronic soundtrack dictates the action. Instead of a static environment, the character plunges into an endless dream, reminiscent of a dynamic tube, dodging obstacles and tracking light paths. Progressing through this world unlocks cosmetic items and a variety of palettes that allow you to fine-tune your turquoise knight’s appearance.

item.title: Hoop Land
item.description: Game Description Hoop Land is a detailed simulator that takes you from a young athlete to the greatest player of all time. The main task is to build your own basketball dynasty, where every decision affects your rise to glory. The path to greatness begins not in the professional arena, but in school. In Career Mode, your character develops as a young prospect who must choose a college, build relationships with teammates, and ultimately enter the draft to earn honors and recognition in the professional league.

item.title: Arcade Forever
item.description: Game Description Arcade Forever is a vertically scrolling 3D space shooter that immerses you in a sci-fi atmosphere of continuous battles. The project offers dynamic gameplay where you have to maneuver among numerous obstacles and enemy squadrons. The main task is to survive and destroy enemies throughout 25 different levels. The gameplay is based on automatic shooting and a system of independent improvements, which allows you to concentrate on dodging enemy fire and tactical movement.

item.title: Pereelous
item.description: Game Description Pereelous is a role-playing adventure in which the fate of the character and all his actions are completely subordinated to the results of the rotation of the slot machine reels. The process of passing is not reduced to blind chance, since success largely depends on the ability to stop the rotation in time to form a profitable combination of symbols. Combinations of signs lead to both the activation of powerful effects and destructive consequences, which forces you to constantly adjust your tactics, based on current results and artifacts unlocked along the way.

item.title: BALL x PIT
item.description: Game Description BALL x PIT is a dynamic roguelike, the events of which unfold in a world that has experienced the death of the great city of Ballbilon. After a mysterious cataclysm, a bottomless Pit was formed on the site of the metropolis, which attracted adventurers and treasure seekers from all over the world. The heroes will have to descend into its dark depths to fight hordes of enemies with the help of ricocheting balls and find the riches left over from the fallen civilization.

item.title: Zaccaria Pinball
item.description: Game Description Zaccaria Pinball is the digital incarnation of pinball machines, offering an extensive collection of tables divided into several categories. Enthusiasts have access to both classic electro-mechanical (EM) devices, like Nautilus or Universe, and more modern solid-state (SS) versions, including Time Machine and Devil Riders. In addition to authentic recreations, the project includes completely redesigned tables such as Space Shuttle 2016 and Farfalla 2017, as well as unique themed designs presented in the Award category, where you can find The Mummy and Aliens.

item.title: Royal Revolt Survivors
item.description: Game Description Royal Revolt Survivors is a continuation of the famous franchise, taking gamers into a fantasy world that is being desecrated by hordes of dark forces. In the role of one of the Warriors from the star cast of heroes in the Royal Revolt universe, you will have to repel the invaders and cleanse your native lands of filth. This project combines elements of a slasher film and a simplified roguelike, where the main task is to survive under the onslaught of hundreds of enemies in a variety of dynamic arenas.

item.title: Vanquish The Eternal
item.description: Game Description Vanquish The Eternal provides an arsenal of unique abilities, extensive talent trees, and a variety of empowering buffs to counter the forces of evil. Players will choose from eight fully voiced characters, including the mysterious Alchemist, to fight back against the nightmarish creatures. Advancement is built on a meta-progression system that allows you to gradually strengthen your heroes for subsequent battles. Deep customization of your fighting style is a key element in preparing for the battle with the main antagonist, whose power increases with each new challenge.

item.title: Absolum
item.description: Game Description Absolum offers to take on the role of outcast heroes living in the world of Talam. These characters oppose the Sun King Azra, seeking to take away his power over magic. The experience combines the mechanics of a side-scrolling beat ‘em up with roguelite elements that influence the progression of each run. To complete the task, you need to move around Talam and fight Azra’s troops for the main goal.

item.title: Dicealot
item.description: Game Description Dicealot follows Queen Guinevere as she strives to save the cursed King Arthur by leading knights through chaos-ridden Camelot. Gamers will face more than 30 types of opponents, from commoners to mythical creatures, in this unpredictable medieval world. Each run is a solo journey with permanent death, forcing you to start a new adventure from scratch. The decisions made directly affect the outcome of the mission to remove the spell that threatens the domain.

item.title: Runeborn
item.description: Game Description Runeborn offers turn-based combat, similar to a slot machine. Spells are activated by rotating runic columns to match symbols along five different lines. Successful combinations initiate attacks against demonic opponents. For increased control, gamers can lock up to 8 individual symbols in place while the rest of the reels spin, allowing them to build powerful streaks. This mechanic underlies all tactical encounters with Malakar’s forces. Strategy in Runeborn is based on direct customization of runic columns.

item.title: Vampire's Best Friend
item.description: Game Description Vampire’s Best Friend - a brave bat, controlled by the user, must make his way through deadly traps and treacherous obstacles to save his owner. The gameplay is based on unique flight mechanics, requiring refined and precise wing strokes to maneuver in confined spaces. The journey unfolds in gloomy but charming locations, among which there are foggy caves and ancient ruins. The visual design is stylized as retro classics, which is achieved through pixel graphics and a limited color palette, creating a nostalgic atmosphere.

item.title: Disaster Arms - Impact Project B.A.H.N.
item.description: Game Description Disaster Arms Impact Project B.A.H.N. - The story of a lonely soldier named Gveral, whose vengeful chase unfolds on the threshold of the global apocalypse. The world stands on the edge of death due to an alien invasion provoked by the ruthless experiments of the Kaisercorps corporation. The past of the gover, known as the “empty soldier”, is revealed through the non -linear narration, presented in the form of stylized comics, immersing in the gloomy atmosphere of the coming anti -utopia.

item.title: LEGO Party!
item.description: Game Description At LEGO Party! Up to 4 opponents battle each other in themed Challenge Zones. The main task is to collect the maximum number of Golden Cubes, winning competitions and interfering with opponents. The competitions themselves take place in recognizable LEGO universes, including those based on the Pirates, Space and NINJAGO series. Gamers will have to navigate locations full of monsters, traps and other threats like flying fried turkeys. Power-ups provide temporary superiority, and well-placed traps can slow down opponents, which creates a spirit of competition.

item.title: Beatblock
item.description: Game Description In Beatblock, the player controls a platform located in the center of a circular arena. As the character Cranky, you need to intercept blocks that appear in time with the melody. This action requires constant rotation to meet targets that appear around the perimeter. Gameplay is complicated by the introduction of four different types of blocks, each requiring a different approach to eliminate. Each track is a self-contained level with a unique visual style, in which the main goal is to score points.

item.title: PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC
item.description: Game Description PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC takes the main character on a journey through the diverse regions of PAC-LAND. The adventure begins after the Ghosts steal the Golden Fruit from PAC-Village, inadvertently releasing a powerful ghost king named Spooky. The key task is to return the stolen artifacts and defeat the antagonist to restore order. The mission begins in an expanded village that serves as a central location from which gamers set out to explore the larger world.

item.title: Tokyo Xtreme Racer
item.description: Game Description Tokyo Xtreme Racer is a racing game set against the backdrop of Tokyo’s vibrant underground street racing scene. The game immerses users in a world where speed and skill reign, and the ultimate goal is to defeat your opponents in intense one-on-one battles. Unlike traditional racing games, the title introduces a unique twist where the main goal is not to take first place, but to destroy the opponent’s Spirit Points (SP).

item.title: Explosive Odds
item.description: Game Description Explosive Odds is a multiplayer competition where financial dominance is achieved through risky bets and the smart use of unique skills. The basis of the gameplay is the betting system, which allows you not only to increase bets in the general pot, but also to conclude side deals on the outcome of your opponents’ actions. To gain an advantage, there are tactical options such as canceling someone else’s skill, copying the last skill used, or completely upgrading your own set of abilities.

item.title: Mamorukun ReCurse!
item.description: Game Description In Mamorukun ReCurse! the summoned souls, together with the main character, end up in the mysterious Underworld. A local priestess reports that the opening gates to the Dark Dimension are sending a curse on the inhabitants of this kingdom. The assembled characters are tasked with cleaning up the locals to prevent disaster. Joining forces is their only chance to return home, which sends the heroes on a journey through a strange land full of possessed enemies.

item.title: TORSO TENNIS
item.description: Game Description TORSO TENNIS is about creating absurd but effective combinations of body parts and tattoos for total domination on the court. Players, controlling only one torso, will have to piece together a powerful tennis mechanism capable of independently generating chain reactions. The basis of everything is a synergy system inspired by auto-battlers, where some items act as triggers to activate the effects of others. This allows you to unleash spectacular combinations, turning each match into a unique event.

item.title: Formula Legends
item.description: Game Description Racers in Formula Legends have been competing in car races for several decades. The gameplay spans the period from the 1960s to the present day, offering 16 vehicle models based on historical prototypes. Races take place at 14 circuits based on famous racing locations. These tracks are not static, they change over the years and offer fresh challenges in each new era. This journey through time clearly shows the evolution of racing cars and track configurations.

item.title: Antivirus PROTOCOL
item.description: Game Description Antivirus PROTOCOL opens up a digital world captured by the ubiquitous Virus, and the gamer is given the role of counter-program. The main task is the methodical extermination of hostile elements that have filled the system. The first steps involve eliminating small pests to obtain their internal components, represented by code fragments and raw data. This process of gathering resources becomes the basis for achieving the main goal - complete cleanup of the infected network.

item.title: Professional Fishing 2
item.description: Game Description Players in Professional Fishing 2 begin their journey as novice anglers with simple equipment. The starter kit includes an old fishing rod, a reel from the 1980s, and bait bread. The landing net helps you catch prey, and the tent allows you to rest and create a save point anywhere. With the accumulation of experience and increasing levels comes progress. Selling the fish you catch earns you the currency you need to purchase upgraded equipment, which gives you access to various techniques such as float fishing, spinning and feeder methods, as well as special baits and sonar for tracking down large prey.

item.title: The Bleakest Keep
item.description: Game Description The Bleakest Keep sends Edward, captain of the guard, to a fortified tower to confront the dark sorcerer Cormac. The adventure begins in the cemetery outside the castle walls, and the final goal awaits at the very top of the structure. Progression involves passing through 4 different levels in the style of dark fantasy, teeming with hordes of zombies, vampires and other creatures. The main task of the player is to reach the peak, defeat the sorcerer and thereby save the kingdom from the nightmares he unleashed on these lands.

item.title: Funguys Swarm
item.description: Game Description Funguys Swarm places the fighter in a burning forest to confront the Fire King’s army using forest weapons and unusual abilities. There is a variety of heroes to choose from, each with unique skills for different combat approaches. The player’s main goal is to withstand continuous attacks from fiery minions and mutated vegetables, whose intensity increases over time. Survival in the top-down arena requires constant maneuvering and timely elimination of these threats.

item.title: Bendy: Lone Wolf
item.description: Game Description Bendy: Lone Wolf sends gamers in the role of Boris deep into the endlessly generated corridors of Joey Drew’s studio in search of supplies. He will have to travel through the bizarre cartoon halls of the animation studio, filled with monsters and obstacles appearing from all sides. This foray becomes a constant test of survival in the face of increasing danger, forcing the hero to face the dark secrets hidden inside the building.

item.title: GRADIUS ORIGINS
item.description: Game Description GRADIUS ORIGINS is a collection of titles from the space shooter series. This collection includes 7 arcade titles from the history of the franchise, offering 18 different versions of them to play. The set includes the Salamander 3 title along with the original video game, including the Japanese, North American and European releases. Gamers also have access to numerous iterations of Salamander and Life Force, giving insight into the development of the arcade series.

item.title: Tower Networking Inc.
item.description: Game Description Tower Networking Inc. puts the player at the head of an Internet provider operating in a single, constantly growing structure. The main task is to design and build network infrastructure for new clients as the tower randomly generates additional floors. Players physically connect equipment, connecting cables between switches, routers, and data risers to establish communications. Each new level introduces unique residential or office spaces, introducing varied service requirements that require constant adaptation to the tower’s growth.

item.title: Achilles: Survivor
item.description: Game Description Achilles: Survivor takes players into a world of intense, non-stop action where survival depends on smart decisions, quick reflexes and strong strategy. You are immersed in a scenario where thousands of enemies are trying to stop you. Your character develops, gaining more strength and capabilities after each attempt. This cycle of death and rebirth becomes the basis of your survival story. As you progress through each wave, your goal is clear: survive and become stronger for the battles ahead.

item.title: FUMES
item.description: Game Description FUMES plunges you into the heart of a chaotic wasteland world where vehicular combat reigns. Users take control of customizable vehicles, equipping them with weapons and armor to survive the unforgiving desert landscape. The title brings an old-school feel to car combat, drawing on the style of classic rally games with driving mechanics that reflect a time before flashy graphics and complex controls. It’s fast-paced, straightforward, and has genuine tension.

item.title: Gold Miner: Classic Edition
item.description: Game Description Gold Miner: Classic Edition puts the player in control of a miner operating an underground winch with a 2D side-scroller perspective. The main task is to launch the swinging gripper in a timely manner to intercept and retrieve gold nuggets, precious stones and other valuables from the ground. Each level offers a new arrangement of resources under a strict time limit, requiring efficient mining of items to complete a financial goal.

item.title: Little Fighter 2 Remastered
item.description: Game Description Little Fighter 2 Remastered introduces an updated version of the multiplayer fighting game. This version introduces completely redrawn graphics, replacing the original assets. It enables local network gaming with up to eight computers connected, expanding multiplayer options for users on the same network. Characters' move sets have been adjusted, which affects how fighters perform actions during combat scenes. Operational improvements have been made by fixing various minor technical issues that existed previously.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Studio
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor Studio is a series of physics-based construction puzzles. The player’s task is to design structures in animated 3D mini-dioramas. The goal is to apply engineering principles to construct functional span crossings. Once the work is completed, a simulation is run to test the structural integrity of the creation under the influence of physical forces. This process determines the stability and success of the building under the load of passing traffic, summing up the test of the architect’s intent.

item.title: The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4
item.description: Game Description The Legend of Dark Witch Episode 4 is a continuation of a series of two-dimensional action games, the gameplay of which is based on clearing locations and strengthening the character. The visual style of the project is made in pixel graphics format. The basis for the heroine’s development is a resource called Tres, received for eliminating opponents at the level. Each location contains hidden special enemies known as Jammers.

item.title: Hopeless Sea
item.description: Game Description Hopeless Sea imagines a world submerged after climate catastrophe melts the polar ice caps. A sea level rise of more than 50 meters has rendered 90 of the planet’s coastal cities uninhabitable, forcing survivors to move inland to escape powerful storms. Soon, a new threat emerged from the ocean depths - mutated aggressive sea creatures that began to attack the last strongholds of people. To save civilization, a final mission is sent to the sea to find the source of the creatures and eliminate the root cause of the disaster.

item.title: Dragon Is Dead
item.description: Game Description Dragon Is Dead throws you headlong into a world remade by a fallen dragon. Gone are the days of majestic flight and fire, replaced by a shadowy kingdom infested with vile creatures. This is not your grandfather’s platformer - here you need not just jump and press buttons, but build a strategy for passing. Each enemy you encounter is a puzzle to solve, a challenge that requires you to adapt your tactics on the fly.

item.title: Two Strikes
item.description: Game Description Battles in Two Strikes take users into casual duels set in the bloody period of ancient Japan. The game is made in the genre of a two-dimensional fighting game, where you have to face opponents and fight to the death, using edged weapons and martial arts skills that allow you to push your opponent away or jump over him in the arena. In battle you have to use strikes, blocks and special techniques that help open up the enemy’s vulnerabilities.

item.title: Deliver At All Costs
item.description: Game Description Deliver At All Costs is a courier simulator that allows you to experience the real madness and bustle of this profession. Trying to deliver a package, you will end up in constant traffic jams, ridiculous situations, etc. You need to move around the city in your used pickup truck. However, it has one feature: the ability to accelerate using nitro. Deliver At All Costs is a project that places a huge emphasis on humor and madness.

item.title: JDM: Japanese Drift Master
item.description: Game Description JDM: Japanese Drift Master is a colorful car simulator that will take you into the exciting world of drifting on the streets of Japan. A huge open world with varied landscapes, from serene lakes to bustling city areas, offers endless opportunities for exploration, racing and, of course, the art of drifting itself. What sets the game apart is the freedom it gives players to customize their cars, allowing them to truly make it their own.

item.title: Capcom Fighting Collection 2
item.description: Game Description Capcom Fighting Collection 2 brings together eight fighting games from the company’s archives. This set contains projects such as Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001 and Project Justice. In addition, the selection includes 3D action games such as Power Stone and Power Stone 2, representing a range of titles covering different time periods. Players have access to this set of experiences in one single edition.

item.title: Vellum
item.description: Game Description Vellum throws gamers into a world filled with strategic combat and decision-making. Go it alone or team up with others to overcome challenges and gain control of your journey. The main highlight of Vellum is the innovative mechanics of influencing the enemy’s development. This gives the strategy an extra layer that goes beyond simply winning the next fight. The heart beats with collaboration. Team up with friends to overcome obstacles together.

item.title: Galactic Plague 2000
item.description: Game Description Galactic Plague 2000 is a large-scale space war against ruthless Martian invaders who have threatened the existence of the entire galaxy. Survival in this chaos directly depends on the constant improvement of the manned starship and unlocking legendary weapons. Each encounter with enemy squadrons becomes a real test of strength, forcing you to adapt tactics and make the most efficient use of the ship’s resources to repel the alien plague.

item.title: FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves
item.description: Game Description FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves is released as a new chapter in the fighting game series, 26 years after the release of the previous main part. This project includes mechanics that provide special offensive capabilities from the very beginning of the fight. It covers the moves REV Arts, REV Accel and REV Blows (with S.P.G. active), and its use is limited by the REV Meter, which overheats from intensive use.

item.title: Viscerafest
item.description: Game Description Viscerafest is a dynamic shooter made in retro style. The game takes you into a sci-fi world where you have to fight alien invaders and various creepy monsters. The arsenal of weapons consists of various futuristic guns. Allows you to take the barrel in your hand to destroy enemies, shooting Macedonian style. Events take place in 3796. The main character of Viscerafest is named Caroline. She is a mercenary and a psychopath rolled into one.

item.title: Monaco 2
item.description: Game Description Monaco 2 invites the player to assemble a specialized squad to carry out cunning heist operations. The main setting is the city of Monaco, presented as a location with many valuable targets due to the wealth concentrated there. Gamers embody members of an international group of criminal specialists seeking to exploit these conditions for material gain. Success requires careful movement through locations, bypassing security and retrieving intended valuables in a tense environment.

item.title: Driveloop: Survivors
item.description: Game Description Driveloop: Survivors puts the player behind the wheel of a rigged car as it navigates a dangerous urban landscape following an unspecified disaster. Gamers will use driving techniques, including skidding and ramming, along with shooting to destroy opponents in a steampunk style. You need to withstand the onslaught of enemy waves in destroyed cities. Success depends on maneuvering the vehicle, choosing an attack position and avoiding threats on the battlefield.

item.title: Slime Squisher
item.description: Game Description Slime Squisher is an arcade project that combines roguelike and clicker mechanics, where the main task is to protect a defenseless berry. The basis for successful completion is the creation of unique assemblies from many improvements, which are unlocked after repelling each enemy wave. The gamer has an extensive arsenal at his disposal, allowing him to customize tactics to suit his style of combat. Progression is implemented through a system of permanent upgrades acquired between runs, which adds strategic depth to the process.

item.title: Vaporwave Pinball
item.description: Game Description Vaporwave Pinball is about immersing yourself in the relaxing atmosphere of liminal spaces, presented in the form of a tiny fantasy operating system. The process unfolds on several tables, each of which immerses you in a unique environment. The locations include both indoor pools and outdoor areas with black and white checkered floors. As you progress, new, more complex arenas open up, requiring honing your skills. Some of them are made in an unexpected horror style, adding a touch of tension to the gameplay.

item.title: cheapskate
item.description: Game Description cheapskate is an arcade skateboarding simulator where the gameplay philosophy is based on complete freedom of action and self-expression. The mechanics are based on predictable and responsive arcade physics, completely eliminating any elements of uncontrolled realism. Precise digital controls provide complete control over every movement, allowing you to perform tricks with great stability. The project is aimed at both veterans of the genre and newcomers, offering a low barrier to entry, but at the same time motivating them to hone their skills.

item.title: STORROR Parkour Pro
item.description: Game Description STORROR Parkour Pro is a parkour simulator set in the Isle of Dogs, London. Users navigate these urban environments using a set of motor abilities derived from the discipline of parkour. Available actions include jumping, climbing, overcoming obstacles, somersaulting, sliding, swinging and running across rooftops and streets. The character’s movement is provided by an animation system that combines motion capture data from parkour athletes with physics calculations to depict dynamics.

item.title: Warm Monkey
item.description: Game Description Warm Monkey is about a desperate struggle for survival in the heart of a concrete jungle, where a troop of small monkeys multiplies under the scorching sun. Instead of the traditional health scale, there is an inexorably decreasing thirst indicator, forcing you to constantly look for saving moisture. The behavior of their relatives, appearing every 10 seconds, is unpredictable: they can fall from a height or run out onto the roadway under the wheels of scooters.

item.title: Speedboat Simulator
item.description: Game Description Speedboat Simulator is a realistic racing simulator where gamers will take control of powerful high-speed boats to participate in water competitions. The main arena for the competition is the picturesque Hawaiian waters, offering many challenging routes. Each available vessel has individual handling and speed parameters, which requires the pilot to constantly adapt his driving style to the specific conditions of the race. Success in racing directly depends on the ability to feel the technique and effectively use its strengths on various sections of the route.

item.title: Reality Break
item.description: Game Description Reality Break takes a unique approach to the ARPG genre, combining fast-paced action with roguelite elements for fresh and unpredictable gameplay. At its core, this is a management game. You play as a mercenary who suddenly gains the ability to distort reality, throwing you into a whirlwind of constant change and danger. As you progress, you will face challenges that require more than just combat skills - it is your mastery of reality control that will determine the outcome.

item.title: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders
item.description: Game Description Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders offers gamers a new look at the snowy slopes. The title takes the core elements of its predecessor and adds new twists, offering users the opportunity to navigate the mountains in both relaxed and competitive modes. The fun begins when you start heading down the slopes, encountering everything from icy lakes to hairpin turns. It’s all about finding your rhythm while pushing the boundaries of your skill.

item.title: Dragon Ruins 2
item.description: Game Description In Dragon Ruins 2, ancient dragons and forgotten treasures are central to the journey. At the beginning, users assemble a squad of four adventurers, each of whom has their own abilities and goals. As you progress through various quests, battles happen automatically, allowing gamers to focus on strategy and planning rather than constant action. In this world, treasure hunting is not just about collecting items, but about uncovering a long-forgotten history full of secrets.

item.title: Talented
item.description: Game Description Talented is an arcade roguelite shoot ‘em up that throws gamers into a chaotic world where survival is key. The project revolves around the character Ed, who will spend 20 nights on the infamous Demon Conveyor Belt (D.C.B). Each night presents him with new challenges as waves of enemies come inexorably, and Ed can only adapt and use a combination of abilities and upgrades to stay alive. The randomness-focused structure makes each session feel different, as no two playthroughs are the same.

item.title: Winter Games Collection
item.description: Game Description Winter Games Collection brings together a variety of winter-themed titles that will provide exciting entertainment for gamers of all ages. The project offers a variety of entertainment, from exciting snowball fights to exciting ice races, all in a festive winter setting. The combination of arcade style and family fun ensures that the game will be fun, whether you want to enjoy a solo adventure or gather a group of friends for competitive fun.

item.title: Entropy Survivors
item.description: Game Description Entropy Survivors is a fast-paced bullet hell roguelike that combines frantic action with unique mechanics. Here, gamers control both a massive mech and a pointy-eared space frog, creating an unusual pair of characters with different abilities. In single or co-op play, gamers must control both units as they fight their way through waves of enemies, each offering their own set of challenges. Gameplay is designed to test reflexes, strategy and timing, requiring quick decision making as users dodge bullets and land their own blows.

item.title: Relic Dudes
item.description: Game Description Relic Dudes is an online multiplayer game that can be played alone or with up to four friends. It’s a survivor-style action RPG where you work together or fight against each other to defeat hordes of different types of enemies. Gamers can collect relics, become stronger, and create unique kits that can change the fate of their team. Both single-player and multiplayer online modes are implemented, which makes it possible to choose a specific gaming style.

item.title: Dungeon Clawler
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Clawler is a deep dive into the dark and unpredictable world of dungeons, where every step could be the beginning of a new legend. The interweaving of mysterious corridors leading to halls shrouded in twilight creates a feeling of continuous discovery of secrets. There are no easy solutions here—treacherous traps, ancient puzzles, and creatures whose origins are shrouded in speculation and fear await the player. Each encounter is a test of character: you can rush into a frontal attack, try to hide in the shadows, or try to find a workaround so as not to get involved in an unnecessary conflict.

item.title: Tricky Madness
item.description: Game Description Tricky Madness is making its way onto the indie gaming scene, promising a wild ride for snowboarding enthusiasts. This adventure game is inspired by classic arcade snowboard games like SSX and 1080, so strap on your virtual board and get ready for some adrenaline-pumping action. The mountain is calling: Buckle up and get ready to fall down the treacherous slopes. This is not just the finish line, it is exploring and overcoming the boundaries of your capabilities.

item.title: Bullet Runner
item.description: Game Description The dynamic shootouts inBullet Runner show the adventures of a pixelated man who is forced to resist against a crowd of evil opponents. The game is a top-down action shooter where you have to fight with various opponents. The project is filled with fast and active gameplay, where users can test the speed of their reaction to current events. You’ll have to move around the map and shoot enemies using a wide arsenal of weapons.

item.title: Social Soccer 25
item.description: Game Description Sociable Soccer 25 brings a new level of excitement to the world of soccer video games. It’s an adventure game that stands out in a crowded market by offering fast-paced, arcade-style gameplay that keeps users on their toes. Gone are the days of overly complex management; The title allows gamers to immerse themselves in the action without requiring a complex learning curve. Once you start, you’re ready to hit the field, and whether you’re a seasoned gamer or just picking up a controller for the first time, you’ll quickly get hooked.

item.title: Shave and Stuff
item.description: Game Description InShave and Stuff, gamers find themselves in a lively and practical simulator, where two roles come to the fore - a hairdresser and a tattoo artist. The title combines hairdressing and paint work, which promotes creativity and experimentation. Whether performing precision cutting tasks or plunging into the complex world of body art, users are immersed in a world of tools, techniques and client preferences. A constant flow of tasks and light humor provide the basis for an original approach to customization and self-expression.

item.title: Tetris Forever
item.description: Game Description Tetris Forever marks a milestone in the history of one of the most famous puzzle games, celebrating the 40th anniversary of Tetris. The collection contains more than 15 different versions, from early versions for Electronika 60 in 1984 to more recent ones, such as Hatris and Super Bombliss DX1, which many users may not have encountered before. The inclusion of these lesser-known games is a treat for those who are passionate about the evolution of Tetris and want to explore its varied history.

item.title: XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION
item.description: Game Description XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION transports gamers to a high-octane world where the classic game of pinball meets hostile forces for an intense blend of arcade action. The adventure follows the path of its predecessor, Demon’s Tilt, and brings familiar gameplay mechanics while adding many new challenges. Each new table offers a new set of obstacles, targets and bonuses that force users to be on their guard. Pinball here is not just about throwing a ball, it is a battle against time, enemies and your own reflexes.

item.title: Locuras en el Banverso
item.description: Game Description Locuras en el Banaverso is a single-player platformer that takes gamers on a chaotic adventure through a bizarre multiverse. The game follows the eccentric YouTuber El Bananero, who not only plays the role of the main character, but also voices him. From the very beginning, El Bananero finds himself in an unexpected situation - he is kidnapped by none other than Santa Claus and his gang of henchmen. As fate would have it, the kidnapping turns into an escape through a portal that leads him into the depths of the multiverse.

item.title: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival
item.description: Game Description Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival is a delightful rhythm game in which users go on an exciting adventure with Don-chan, a cute drummer, and his new friend Kumo-kyun, an adorable cloud-like creature. The rhythmic escapade takes place in the city of Omiko, where the duo strives to rise to the level of taiko masters. The game offers gamers two modes: an interesting story mode with Don-chan and Kumo-kyun, and a rhythm-rich Taiko, which features 76 songs of various genres - from anime anthems to pop hits, classical compositions and original tracks.

item.title: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split
item.description: Game Description Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split takes users into the disturbing environment of Cypress Ridge, where chaos reigns amid a zombie outbreak. Set in the early moments of this disaster, gamers are given the choice of one of two different characters: Lydia, a seasoned police officer, or Hank, a figure shrouded in mystery whose goals differ sharply from Lydia’s. These choices affect how users interact with the narrative, resulting in different experiences as they navigate a city filled with danger.

item.title: Vengeance Hunters
item.description: Game Description Vengeance Hunters is a side-scrolling beat-‘em-up that captures the essence of classic arcade action. Here users can choose one of several characters, each of which has different abilities and fighting styles. These choices play an important role in how gamers approach gaming challenges. Going through various stages, users encounter many enemies, each of which has unique behavior and attack style. With a variety of characters, gamers will be able to find the fighting style that suits their preferences.

item.title: Speedollama
item.description: Game Description Speedollama is a fast-paced platform shooter that takes gamers into a world where llamas battle an army of alpacas. The unusual premise draws users into a chaotic world where humor and action collide in the most unexpected ways. The goal is simple: control a llama equipped with a mining machine and destroy waves of alpaca enemies. The title features a vibrant environment filled with quirky characters and varied challenges, making every moment exciting.

item.title: Up to Par
item.description: Game Description Up to Par is more than just minigolf! Take on procedurally generated levels with up to 16 friends or alone, but remember that every hit counts. Stay below par to avoid being eliminated from the game! You will have to show your skills and planning to progress as far as possible and unlock the next course. Can you beat your record? Will you be able to defeat your friends?

item.title: Tech Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Tech Store Simulator immerses gamers in the fast-paced world of tech retail, giving them hands-on experience in running their own electronics store. The title’s focus is on strategic decision-making, requiring users to balance inventory management with customer satisfaction. Gamers will have to navigate the ins and outs of running a successful tech business, from stocking shelves with the latest gadgets to setting competitive prices. Hiring and managing staff is another key aspect of the game to keep the store running smoothly and efficiently.

item.title: Victory Heat Rally
item.description: Game Description Victory Heat Rally is a retro racing game inspired by arcade games of the last century, such as Hang-On and OutRun. You have to take control of small cars to rush along various difficult tracks at high speed. The gameplay is hardcore and pays homage to the classic games of yesteryear. To fully master the mechanics of Victory Heat Rally, you will need to learn how to glide around the track, take corners correctly, and feel the road.

item.title: Dwarven Realms
item.description: Game Description Dwarven Realms is an action-oriented 3D ARPG that invites gamers to immerse themselves in a realm filled with intense combat and deep character customization. Users will have to explore vast underground kingdoms and navigate treacherous caves, facing insurmountable waves of enemies. The gameplay emphasizes a variety of combat techniques, allowing you to choose your preferred style, be it using a bow or spells. The design encourages players to create a unique character, unlocking different abilities suited to different combat strategies.

item.title: Iron Meat
item.description: Game Description Iron Meat is a dynamic platformer made in the style of arcade shooters of the last century. The game takes place on Mars, when a group of scientists disappeared from radar without a trace. The case is entrusted to a member of an elite squad who goes in search of missing people. He must find out what really happened and who is behind this mysterious event. The gameplay takes inspiration from classic action games such as Contra.

item.title: Halls of Torment
item.description: Game Description Halls of Torment invites you into the world of terrifying monsters in this unique action game with roguelite elements, where you will face new challenges and dangers in each game. Dive into the dark and ruthless dungeons where the lords of the underworld await you. Find treasures and magical artifacts, and assemble a team of heroes who will help you defeat the horrors emanating from the depths of the earth.

item.title: Rally Arcade Classics
item.description: Game Description Rally Arcade Classics takes gamers into the heart of rally racing history, bringing classic arcade gaming to the world of motorsports. With 44 cars from four different decades - the 70s, 80s, 90s and 00s - you’ll get a look at the cars that helped shape the rally scene. There’s a wide variety of iconic cars here, each offering its own set of challenges and driving features. In addition to the impressive list of cars, there are 48 tracks, each designed for a different type of racing.

item.title: The Karate Kid: Street Rumble
item.description: Game Description The Karate Kid: Street Rumble is a beat ‘em up title that immerses you in the world of the cult trilogy. Users step into the shoes of characters such as Daniel LaRusso, Mr. Miyagi, Ali Mills and Kumiko as they battle through various levels inspired by the films. The game has a side-scrolling format in which players face waves of enemies, including famous antagonists such as Johnny Lawrence, John Croesus and Terry Silver.

item.title: Slackers - Carts of Glory
item.description: Game Description Slackers - Carts of Glory is a racing adventure game that is something out of the ordinary. Instead of racing along the highway in luxury cars, you’re pushing a shopping cart. Yes, you heard right. It’s like playing supermarket, but with more fun and chaos. The basic idea is simple: you are part of a group of friends and try to get to the store before it closes. But what is the difficulty?

item.title: UFO 50
item.description: Game Description The UFO 50 project is a collection of single and multiplayer games made in different genres, such as platformers, shooters, puzzles, roguelike or role-playing adventures. The style is made in old school retro graphics, which creates an 8-bit aesthetic in the design of locations. Each of the fifty video games gives you the opportunity to try out full-fledged gameplay with different levels, where there is a beginning and an end to the single-player campaign.

item.title: Judero
item.description: Game Description Judero immerses you in the world of strategic decisions and tactical battles. The title combines elements of role-playing and strategy, requiring gamers to go through various challenges and opponents. Users must manage resources, create alliances and make important decisions that will affect the outcome of their journey. In Judero, users encounter a variety of characters, each with unique abilities and history. These characters can be recruited into the player’s team, giving them various tactical advantages in battle.

item.title: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
item.description: Game Description Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines is a 2D action platformer that follows the adventures of Pablo and Luna. Users move through different dimensions, using unique abilities to overcome obstacles and enemies. It combines swinging, jumping and explosions to provide dynamic gameplay. In the title, gamers alternate between the characters Pablo and Luna. Pablo uses a grappling hook to progress through levels, while Luna brings her own set of skills to the table.

item.title: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown
item.description: Game Description Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown – restart of a series of arcade racing games. You can feel the vibration of hundreds of horses under the hood with modern graphics and physics. You can choose from top-notch hypercars from legendary manufacturers such as Koenigsegg, Porsche, Dodge, Ferrari, Lamborghini or Bugatti. It is worth understanding that luxury cars will require experience and skills, so you need to open them gradually. Each vehicle can be modified and customized to suit your preferences.

item.title: Turbo Sliders Unlimited
item.description: Game Description Turbo Sliders Unlimited is an opportunity to plunge into racing competitions in multiplayer or single player mode, where users can tune cars. The gameplay is made in the form of arcade races with a top view, where users will compete with racers on various professional tracks. The game has a special editor, which allows you to design your own levels, locations, vehicles and flexibly customize tournament modes. In the multiplayer “Turbo Sliders Unlimited” up to 20 people (including observers) can participate simultaneously, which is suitable for creating e-sports tests.

item.title: I Am Your Beast
item.description: Game Description I Am Your Beast is not your average shooter. This narrative-driven game throws you headlong into a brutal conflict with the shadowy organization you once worked for. You play as Alphonse Harding, a former operative who has been lured back into the world of underground warfare. Survival and thinking quickly are key. You’ll have to navigate treacherous terrain, dodging and fighting enemies in a high-stakes chase. Forget about going with guns at the ready.

item.title: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
item.description: Game Description Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland is a new action-platformer that brings beloved characters from the 1990s Nickelodeon series into a vibrant, imaginative world. Together with Tommy, Chucky, Phil and Lil, users will go on an adventure inspired by their favorite video game character, Reptar. The title features a unique co-op design that allows gamers to form teams and complete various levels located in the Pickles' home. The gameplay of Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland revolves around exploration and teamwork.

item.title: Utopia Must Fall
item.description: Game Description Utopia Must Fall is a basic defense arcade shooter where gamers take on the role of humanity’s last line of defense against an alien invasion. The action takes place in a post-apocalyptic metropolis, and players will have to defend the city from relentless waves of alien aggressors. The gameplay of Utopia Must Fall is based on strategic resource management and quick decision making. Gamers must carefully manage their resources to upgrade their defenses and purchase new weapons, ensuring they are properly prepared for the challenges ahead.

item.title: Guns And Draguns
item.description: Game Description Guns And Draguns is a top-down co-op shooter that plunges gamers into a dangerous fantasy dungeon. Here users will have to go through various levels, destroying fantasy monsters with weapons. The main goal is to defeat the final boss, but along the way there are enemies and obstacles that require strategic teamwork and cooperation. Gamers can choose one of seven unique characters, each of which has its own abilities.

item.title: Smells Like a Mushroom
item.description: Game Description Smells Like a Mushroom is a sci-fi third-person shooter that takes gamers on a journey through the Milky Way.
