At the center is an invasion of creatures known as Magic Mushrooms. Users take on the role of Carrotado, a brave character tasked with preventing disaster. The gameplay includes platformer and shooter mechanics, and missions take place on various planets in the solar system. Smells Like a Mushroom’s narrative is driven by an absurd story and features both single-player and co-op modes.

item.title: Call of Sentinels
item.description: Game Description Call of Sentinels plunges you headlong into an epic struggle against the forces of darkness. Choose your champion from a growing list, each with unique skills and fighting styles. Hone your combat skills against the relentless hordes in the Arena, or take on dangerous journeys across varied landscapes in Campaign. Unleash devastating combos and master tactical maneuvers to defeat treacherous enemies and colossal bosses. Each victory unlocks valuable upgrades, expanding the hero’s capabilities and shaping his legend.

item.title: CarX Street
item.description: Game Description TheCarX Street car simulator allows you to build your own car and hit the streets to conquer the whole city. The metropolis is presented on a huge scale, including its surroundings: city streets, industrial area, picturesque highways, etc. CarX Streets features drifting, high-speed chases, heavy traffic and intense competition in online races. The main feature of the game is the possibility of deep car customization and wide tuning possibilities.

item.title: Monster Jam Showdown
item.description: Game Description Monster Jam Showdown is an adrenaline-pumping off-road racing experience that is sure to get your heart racing. Gamers can get behind the wheel of iconic monster trucks and compete in a variety of challenging environments. From dirt tracks to stadiums, the game offers a variety of racing arenas. The project has ten different modes and is designed for users of any level of training. Whether you’re a seasoned veteran or just a new rider, there’s something for everyone.

item.title: Supermoves
item.description: Game Description Supermoves - This parkour party promises wild fun. Users sprint, jump and grind the rails in intense challenges. Bomb Tag, Rising Tide and Royale modes offer different thrills. Up to forty gamers can race, pursue and compete. Makea Games' level editor allows users to create their own experiences. Makeaverse is waiting for you. Everyone can dive in, build and play. Supermoves combines competition and creativity. Casual players and parkour professionals will find their place.

item.title: MT Force Aliens Uprising
item.description: Game Description MT Force Aliens Uprising is a fast-paced action game that combines sci-fi elements with old-school gameplay. The setting, in which a government team known as MT Force must confront the chaos caused by a scientist’s contact with alien forces, offers a title with a plot that keeps gamers on the edge of their seats. The world leans into the retro vibes of the 1980s and 1990s, combining both side-scrolling platformer and shooter action.

item.title: Nova Drift
item.description: Game Description Nova Drift is a top-down action RPG adventure. The gamer has the opportunity to test his strength in piloting a space fighter, forced to fight enemies that are superior in numbers and firepower. The spaceship uses unusual technologies; it is created using biomechanics, which means that it seems to be alive and is constantly changing both in appearance and in terms of available weapons. Thanks to the addition of artificial intelligence trained in procedural random generation, the developers from a small indie formation were able to achieve almost endless replayability.

item.title: Old School Rally
item.description: Game Description In Old School Rally, users get behind the wheel of fire-breathing rally cars that spit dust and gravel as they make their way through unforgiving landscapes. Forget about fancy bells and whistles - the main thing here is pure, unadulterated driving skill. Racers must think, react quickly and tame their wild stallions in a variety of conditions. Each track throws a unique gauntlet at the gamer. One moment you might be struggling for control on a dusty desert highway, and the next you might be on treacherous snow and ice.

item.title: Be My Horde
item.description: Game Description In Be My Horde, users play the role of Moriana, a necromancer. The world is dangerous, but Moriana has a unique ability: turning fallen enemies into an army. Death is not the end, it is a resource. The gameplay revolves around resurrection. Every enemy defeated becomes a soldier in Moriana’s horde. Their souls fuel her growth, giving her new abilities. Her base, Dominion, serves as a hub for ability upgrades.

item.title: Bloody Knuckles Street Boxing
item.description: Game Description Bloody Knuckles Street Boxing challenges those looking for shallow arcade-style fights, focusing solely on skill. The project deliberately creates a deep gap in the level of training of fighters, abandoning any auxiliary systems. There is no room for easy victories here, because every aspect of the battle is under complete control. Thanks to pressure-sensitive controls, the fighter becomes an accurate reflection of the gamer’s actions, requiring tactical understanding and lightning-fast reactions.

item.title: JustAxe
item.description: Game Description JustAxe is the adventure of a young girl named Marta, who must save her sister from the clutches of mysterious creatures that have invaded her hometown of Novy Sovetsk. Having received a mysterious letter indicating the path to salvation, the heroine arms herself with her grandfather’s ax and sets off on a dangerous journey. Her path runs through picturesque but dangerous locations: from forests and mountains to a gloomy other dimension from where the invaders came.

item.title: Bang Average Football
item.description: Game Description Bang Average Football brings new energy to the world of sports games. Here, gamers are immersed in fast-paced matches with an intuitive setup that makes it accessible to anyone who wants to kick a virtual ball around. Whether you’re playing with friends in a multiplayer match or challenging yourself in Story mode, there’s always something to keep you busy. The title is not about perfection, but about enjoying an imperfect but compelling approach to football.

item.title: Footgun: Underground
item.description: Game Description Footgun: Underground throws you into a chaotic mix of football and roguelike action. You emerge from cryogenic sleep into a strange post-apocalyptic future, equipped with a cybernetic leg, a ball and amnesia. This underground world is infested with mutants, and your trusty ball is your only defense. Footgun: Underground offers a unique twist. Instead of swords, guns or magic, you rely solely on your ball skills. Think classic roguelike: explore procedurally generated rooms, fight a variety of creatures, and upgrade your gear.

item.title: Moorhuhn - Crazy Chicken Traps and Treasures
item.description: Game Description Moorhuhn - Crazy Chicken Traps and Treasures is a fast-paced arcade adventure full of danger and ancient secrets, set in an impenetrable jungle. On the way to his cherished goal, the main character is confronted not only by ingenious traps, but also by a whole string of colorful opponents. The path is blocked by evil gorillas, ferocious crocodiles, mysterious shamans and even forest spirits, along with aliens stuck in the thicket.

item.title: Contra: Operation Galuga
item.description: Game Description Contra: Operation Galuga, the latest installment in the legendary Contra series, delivers a nostalgic adrenaline rush for fans and newcomers alike. This run-and-gun reimagining of the classic ’80s action film offers a new take on the iconic franchise. Players embark on a high-octane adventure as elite Contra commandos Bill Riser and Lance Bean. Their task is to prevent the Red Falcon terrorist group from seizing the Galuga Islands near New Zealand.

item.title: Balatro
item.description: Game Description Balatro - the word “poker” crackles with energy, whispering promises of high stakes and cunning deals. This poker roguelike beckons players into a deck-building odyssey where bluffing becomes the spell and chips become your lifeblood. Forget about limping into pots with low pairs. Here you create powerful synergies by weaving intricate combinations that unleash explosive power. Valid poker hands dance with unique wild cards, their abilities changing the course of the game like a magician.

item.title: Cash Cow DX
item.description: Game Description Cash Cow DX immerses users in an exciting arcade adventure reminiscent of 80s vibes. Gamers take on the role of a character who has to win wealth from the notorious Pig Pockets. As gamers progress through five multi-screen levels, they are faced with various obstacles and challenges that test their skills. The title is characterized by a high level of difficulty that does not allow continuations, which increases the stakes for each move.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
item.description: Game Description Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is not your average survival game, but a single-player, addictive auto-shooting game that is sure to keep you on your toes. As a lone dwarf, you’ll have to use every weapon in your arsenal to fight off waves of deadly aliens while earning riches and unlocking powerful upgrades. But don’t think this will be an easy task. You will have to face the harsh and unforgiving landscape of the planet Hoxes, and only your wits and weapons can protect you.

item.title: Skibidi Toilets: Invasion
item.description: Game Description Skibidi Toilets: Invasion throws you into a whirlwind of cyborg toilet chaos. Play as a secret agent armed with an arsenal of weapons tasked with quelling a toilet rebellion. Unleash your fury in seven diverse environments, from desolate cityscapes to chilling graveyards, each presenting unique strategic challenges. Welcome to a world where porcelain turns into brawl. This exciting FPS will pit you against rebel toilets, each of which has more firepower than a regular toilet plunger.

item.title: Tekken 8
item.description: Game Description Tekken 8 is a continuation of the cult fighting game, directly continuing the story of the previous part. In the sequel, many beloved heroes return, and new fighters are introduced. A full-fledged story campaign is presented, telling the dramatic story of Jin Kazama’s family. In addition, you will find many different modes, including multiplayer battles, various tests, local co-op, the ability to customize fighters, etc. The gameplay of Tekken 8 is based on a complex combat system based on memorizing combinations and timings of opponents.

item.title: Just Click The Button
item.description: Game Description Just Click The Button is an unusual project where the central element is a single button, and pressing it multiple times launches a whole chain of gameplay transformations. The whole process comes down to a choice between endless development and the desire to achieve one of the four available endings. The path to each of the finals directly depends on the chosen strategy. The combination of acquired abilities determines the ease of passing and achieving a specific outcome, which encourages the deliberate formation of your style.

item.title: SUPER CRAZY RHYTHM CASTLE
item.description: Game Description SUPER CRAZY RHYTHM CASTLE will take you to a bizarre world filled with absurdity and frivolity. The mission is clear: defeat the eccentric King Ferdinand and restore rhythmic order to the kingdom. The game features a motley crew of unlikely heroes who must overcome bizarre challenges. From launching beans in an ancient summoning ritual to drowning out a colossal eggplant DJ and smearing gravy on tiny meat people - all while keeping the beat - the journey is a surreal mixture of music and adventure.

item.title: The Elephant Collection
item.description: Game Description The Elephant Collection is a collection that features the blue elephant in ten different games. These adventure games span a variety of genres, including puzzle platformers and fast-paced arcade games. Gamers are faced with various mechanics, each of which offers its own set of obstacles and challenges. An overarching narrative runs throughout the collection, tying the individual adventures together and creating a cohesive experience for those who immerse themselves in the game.

item.title: Mostroscopy
item.description: Game Description Mostroscope is a title that draws heavily on the traditions of classic arcade combat, combining elements of the horror genre and Mexican luchador films of the 1950s. Set against a backdrop of monsters and masked wrestlers, this adventure game has a distinctive atmosphere reminiscent of old movies, while offering simple but fun combat mechanics. Most of the time, fighting games tend to be cluttered with overly complex systems. However, the gameplay here is accessible, and the control scheme, inspired by classics like Smash Bros and Street Fighter x Tekken, allows users to quickly jump into the action without requiring a steep learning curve.

item.title: Cavalry Girls
item.description: Game Description Cavalry Girls is an exciting top-down shooter that immerses you in a futuristic world where brave and fearless girl soldiers fight unforgiving enemies. This addicting game seamlessly combines action, strategy and customization to deliver an immersive gaming experience. In a world where the versatile mineral “jade” fuels a bionic revolution and sparks conflict, players take on the role of commander of a team that directs mechanized armor-piercing girls to defend a besieged city from enemy forces.

item.title: Ray'z Arcade Chronology
item.description: Game Description Rayz Arcade Chronology is a collection that invites you to immerse yourself in the digital space, where the Waverider manned fighter is presented as a virus, whose main task is to penetrate deep into the system. The mission, known as Operation RayCrisis, is to fight against the self-aware neurocomputer Con-Human who has rebelled against humanity. Advancement through levels is associated with a unique Encroachment mechanic: if you do not destroy enemies quickly enough, a special meter is filled, and when 100% is reached, you are forced to move to the final clash, which directly affects the outcome of the entire operation.

item.title: DriveCrazy
item.description: Game Description DriveCrazy is an arcade madness that asks you to get behind the wheel of a miniature truck amid the total destruction of the apocalyptic landscapes of Japan. The main task is to survive in the face of constant pursuit by mysterious creatures. To avoid missiles and falling buildings, it is possible to move along vertical surfaces. The process of destroying environmental objects, such as pillars, trees and fences, is directly related to replenishing the supply of nitro acceleration.

item.title: Super Raft Boat Together
item.description: Game Description Super Raft Boat Together is an adventure for those who love danger and teamwork! In a world inundated by a mysterious flood, you and your trusty boat are all that’s left. But don’t be afraid! Along with three friends, you’ll battle ruthless sea creatures as you build and expand your raft to reach the final island, where the truth about the flood will finally be revealed. This multiplayer roguelike shooter offers endless excitement as you navigate a variety of breathtaking biomes, strategically choosing trinkets to create the ultimate, super-powered structure.

item.title: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward
item.description: Game Description Punch Club 2: Fast Forward is a 2D action fighting game for real fighters who are not afraid of difficulties and are ready to fight their way through life’s challenges. You, as the main character, have spent 20 long years patiently waiting for your moment in your mother’s cramped garage, dreaming of a better life and searching for your missing father. But life doesn’t give you anything for nothing, and there will be many obstacles and troubles on your way.

item.title: Brotato
item.description: Game Description In the shooterBratato you have to take control of a potato using a variety of guns while fighting alien creatures. The gameplay includes roguelite genre elements. Locations are procedurally generated, and each run can take up to 30 minutes of real time. There are dozens of types of weapons and additional items of equipment to choose from, allowing you to progress at your own pace and combine the effects of items.

item.title: Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure
item.description: Game Description Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure is a virtual adventure, the plot of which is built around the confrontation between two heroines and the villain Cyblin Lord. The narrative is split between two realities. In one of them, the protagonist is Dot, a character in the in-game world, and in the other, her creator named Bug, an Atari employee. The antagonist interferes with Bug’s past, trying to change her creative plans and prevent the creation of a happy universe for Dot.

item.title: Elypse
item.description: Game Description Elypse is an atmospheric metroidvania, which is a mixture of classic platformer and 2D action. The action takes place in the very depths of hell. The plot tells how every 10 years it is necessary to sacrifice people to the Abyss in order to protect oneself from the mystical Abyss - an otherworldly force with destructive power. Unfortunately, the main character was chosen to become a victim. There is always a chance of salvation: if you manage to pass all the tests that the Abyss has prepared, then you can continue your life.

item.title: Keeper's Toll
item.description: Game Description Keeper’s Toll is a fun and challenging game that will test the skills of any gamer who enjoys the classic retro time survival genre. Featuring unique dark fantasy elements, the game boasts a carefully crafted blend of skill-based gameplay, roguelike elements, and unique mechanics that set it apart from others in the genre. Gamers will be able to choose from six different heroes, each with their own defining mechanics, abilities, and meta progression.

item.title: Tape to Tape
item.description: Game Description Tape to Tape is a sports simulation that offers gamers an original roguelite approach. Every decision you make has a huge impact on your journey to creating the best hockey team. Choose your path, recruit unique players, find synergies between them, choose special abilities, bribe the judges or visit the Blademaster to restore the former glory of hockey. Explore the beautiful world of hockey in a roguelike style, where every decision you make matters as you rebuild hockey in all its glory.

item.title: Magical Drop 6
item.description: Game Description Magical Drop VI, the next installment in the popular Japanese arcade game series, combines a captivating storyline, colorful characters, various modes and difficulty levels, and the ability to play with other people online or offline. In this game, you can choose your favorite character from 15, each with their own personality, backstory, and soundtrack. You can then choose from a variety of available modes, depending on your mood and preferences.

item.title: First Racer
item.description: Game Description First Racer is an arcade race where victory is achieved not only through quick reactions, but also through proper preparation of the car. The project offers a wide range of competitive disciplines, covering both city streets and specialized tracks. For fans of extreme driving, there are cross-country races that require a special approach to control. Drifting competitions, in turn, test your car control in a controlled drift, where points are awarded based on angle, speed and style of execution.

item.title: Crab Champions
item.description: Game Description Crab Champions is one of those projects where the gamer is given control of an extraordinary hero. As you can guess from the name, the characters of the game are crabs. The setting is tropical islands - the player will be surrounded by palm trees, sand, ocean, stones and exotic animals. And also other crabs, armed to the teeth. Crab Champions can be played in three different modes: Co-op.

item.title: Saga of Sins
item.description: Game Description Saga of Sins is an atmospheric action role-playing game in a dark setting in which you take on the role of demonic creatures to fight the deadly sins and free the village of Sinwell from the infection. In this action-packed adventure, you play as Cecil the priest, who can enter people’s minds and transform into unique demons, each with their own individual skills and abilities. Fight enemies, collect gold and upgrade your demons to become even stronger and face new challenges.

item.title: Boneraiser Minions
item.description: Game Description Boneraiser Minions plunges you into a very dark fantasy universe, where powerful creatures once lived, whom people called boneraisers. They were none other than necromancers - wizards who delved into the study of the dark arts and, with their help, learned to raise the dead from their graves, then making their slaves out of them. The main character is one of these magicians, who was caught red-handed and decided to resort to the only method practiced in those days - burning at the stake and then burial in a sacred temple.

item.title: Spectator
item.description: Game Description Spectator can please fans of Internet folklore. This game is inspired by popular urban legends. Here you can go Backstage, visit Slenderman’s habitat and visit other locations. It’s full of all kinds of references. The video game is a representative of the point-and-click survival horror genre. The indie title uses a first-person perspective. Before you start, you can choose one of 3 difficulty types: normal, hard and nightmare. There are 6 levels (days) in total.

item.title: Risky Woods
item.description: Game Description Risky Woods invites gamers to a breathtaking, adrenaline-filled arcade adventure! Are you ready to take on the biggest test yet? As the fearless warrior Rohan, you must fight your way through treacherous forests and dark caves. But beware - the path is full of dangers, from stomping Skeletons to insidious traps and face-snatching flying devils! Arms in hand, you must navigate treacherous terrain, free petrified monks, and defeat the evil Draxos once and for all.

item.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game – Complete Edition
item.description: Game Description Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game - Complete Edition is a whirlwind arcade action-adventure game based on the plot of the famous series of graphic novels and the movie of the same name. In addition to the original game, equally exciting add-ons Knives Chau and Wallace are also available. Players can choose to play through many of their favorite characters, such as Scott Pilgrim himself, Ramona, Knives, Stephen Stills and others.

item.title: Military Conflict: Vietnam
item.description: Game Description Military Conflict: Vietnam is a fast-paced multiplayer first-person shooter that combines fast-paced arcade action with the realism of intense battles. The game invites you to plunge into the fierce confrontation between the American army and the Viet Cong guerrillas, concentrating on close combat. The gameplay mechanics and controls are familiar to fans of the genre, which allows you to quickly immerse yourself in the process, and for beginners there is a training ground where you can hone your skills.

item.title: SokoFrog
item.description: Game Description SokoFrog is a Sokoban-style puzzle game where the main goal is to move blocks to open a passage to the next stage. The little frog is under control and needs help in solving spatial problems. The entire gameplay is built around one central mechanic: you need to place a box with a symbol printed on it on a tile with a similar image. Successfully completing this action will unlock the door leading further.

item.title: Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration
item.description: Game Description Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration takes gamers on an interactive adventure that follows the development of the video game industry over fifty years. Users will watch a variety of arcade projects in which they will take part. You will be able to enjoy a variety of gameplay mechanics that underlie the following projects: Swordquest, VCTR-SCTR, Neo Breakout, Quadtank, Yars' Revenge Reimagined, Haunted Houses, etc. Users of Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration will have a wide variety of opportunities to immerse themselves in pixelated arcade games made in the spirit of old-school retro games from the 90s.

item.title: The Exorcist's Story
item.description: Game Description The Exorcist’s Story is an atmospheric 2D adventure game in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a young priest, Antonio, who had experience in performing exorcism rituals. But one day everything went wrong and a girl died during the ceremony. You escaped prison, but you promised yourself never to perform such rituals again. But a few years later, strange things begin to happen in your small town and Asmodeus, the demon you once encountered, challenges you again.

item.title: Lunistic
item.description: Game Description Lunistice may be of interest to those nostalgic for early 3D platformers. The graphics in this project are specially made in a low-poly style and in low resolution. This retro platformer imitates the console hits that came out on fifth-generation consoles in the 90s. He suggests exploring the memories of the main character named Hana. In the story, she is trying to get to the Moon. Her adventures consist of linear levels.

item.title: Last Command
item.description: Game Description Last Command is deceptively easy to learn. To control, the player will only need the arrows on the keyboard and the mouse, but this does not make the task easier at all. A huge number of obstacles on the way, bosses with a large area of ​​​​AoE damage and many additional small attacks will definitely not let you relax. The game is perfect for those who love hardcore challenges mixed with a puzzle.

item.title: Vampire Survivors
item.description: Game Description Survival in theVampire Survivors universe is based on minimalist gameplay, where you have to move around the map and knock out as much gold as possible. The main task for the protagonist is to advance through the levels generated in roguelight style. You need to try to survive the night, fighting off monsters and higher undead. Vampires will hunt for the protagonist, not giving him the opportunity to rest at a rest or come up with a future plan of action.

item.title: NeverAwake
item.description: Game Description NeverAwake is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer with beautiful hand-drawn graphics about a girl named Rem. She is still a child of 10 years old and suffers from regular nightmares in which she strives to conquer everything that brought her resentment and pain in real life. Her opponents are not the classic monsters from banal dreams, but those who were somehow able to damage her psyche. These are school friends and just classmates, dentists who hurt when they pulled out teeth and even yard dogs that try to bite her every morning when she goes to school.

item.title: HYPER DEMON
item.description: Game Description HYPER DEMON is a minimalist and experimental first-person shooter. It stands out for its visual style. It has very fast and dynamic gameplay. Here you can make jerks, slide, perform regular jumps and something like rocket jumps. There are more than a dozen techniques in total. You can master all these mechanics through training. The protagonist shoots daggers at demonic creatures from his outstretched hand. He is also capable of using consumable gems.

item.title: Rollerdrome
item.description: Game Description The Rollerdrome shooter combines dynamic and vibrant battles, smooth graphics, third-person view and tactical mechanics that allow you to influence the outcome of the battle even with lower chances of winning. The player will have to participate in fierce battles with a variety of opponents. By killing opponents, the main character restores health and replenishes ammunition. During the fight, you can perform spectacular tricks, dodges, or use various tactical movements to eliminate opponents.

item.title: GigaBash
item.description: Game Description GigaBash is an adventure game about huge kaiju monsters capable of destroying entire cities. One day, humanity was faced with a global threat: huge monsters appeared on Earth and began to wage a protracted battle among themselves, destroying human settlements and killing each other. Gigabash talks about how complete chaos reigned on the planet: people fight against unknown creatures, monsters fight with themselves and confront people. Absolute madness and destruction reign.

item.title: Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate
item.description: Game Description Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate is an alternate version of chess with elements of classic roguelikes. Users will have to go on action missions, controlling a selected figure with a royal shotgun. The main task for the protagonist will be the destruction of enemy objects on a field designed in the form of a standard chessboard. Players have to destroy the white pieces on behalf of the Black King, who has prepared firearms.

item.title: Shredders
item.description: Game Description Shredders is a snowboarding simulator. The indie project contains a large number of references for fans of this sport and related media products. You can play it alone or with other users online. For single-player fans, there is a single-player story mode. The plot begins with the protagonist and best friend Scotty trying to make entertaining videos about winter extreme sports. A representative of one of the brands named Lisa contacts them and offers sponsorship along with participation in the championship.

item.title: Dawn of the Monsters
item.description: Game Description Dawn of the Monsters takes place in the distant future. According to it, humanity has achieved a certain technological progress. But everything turned out to be not so rosy. Evil and cruel invaders have arrived on Earth and are ready to do anything to enslave humanity. They are called Nephilim. True, the little people also have aces up their sleeves. The global network of the defense alliance decides to engage them in battle, and is even ready to sacrifice lives.

item.title: Pets at Work
item.description: Game Description Pets at Work is a colorful arcade puzzle adventure game designed for local multiplayer that revolves around a group of funny animals who have lost their owners in an office building. To find people, pets must interact as a team using boxes, mats, buttons and climbing on shelves and tables. Dozens of levels have been implemented, each of which has more than six different mechanics, which provides players with exciting and dynamic gameplay.

item.title: Forza Horizon 5
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 5 is a racing game that focuses on multiplayer racing and free-roaming in an open world. This project includes many aspects from Forza’s previous games. More than 200 original cars from real-life companies are presented, with realistic driving and clutch physics. There are high-quality graphics, effects and other elements that completely immerse users in a believable environment. While riding around the world, the player is able to collide with other gamers or ordinary cars controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Bubble Bobble 4 Friends: The Baron's Workshop
item.description: Game Description Bubble Bobble 4 Friends: The Baron’s Workshop is an atmospheric adventure where you have to control small bubbles. The user will have to solve puzzles and various tasks that require a logical approach. You have to take control of Bub, Bob, Peb or Pub, who are capable of exploding interactive objects in the environment, in order to cope with offenders and opponents living in the locations. Players need to visit a large number of locations made in a colorful style.

item.title: Skydrift Infinity
item.description: Game Description Skydrift Infinity is an arcade game with simulator elements that allows you to take the controls of an airplane and rush through the picturesque expanses of an interactive world. You can fly in free mode or compete with other pilots. If it is impossible to catch up with the enemy, then you can shoot him down! Exotic islands are available for exploration, representing huge arenas for air racing.

item.title: F1 2021
item.description: Game Description F1 2021 is a racing car simulator. The new part of the series provides an opportunity to take part in the 2021 season of the Formula 1 championship. Thanks to the official license, the product contains real teams, drivers and tracks. There is a choice of difficulty. Here you can configure the aggressiveness of artificial intelligence, the severity of the rules, and the driving assistance system. Casual users will be able to make the gameplay more arcade-like, and hardcore users will be able to add realism to the gameplay.

item.title: Agent Intercept
item.description: Game Description Agent Intercept is a dynamic arcade game full of exciting chases, intrigue, explosions and destruction. As the main character, you need to stop the crime syndicate CLAWS. They are developing a powerful transforming machine that is capable of destroying the entire world. You need to drive a car called Scepter. Transport is equipped with the latest gadgets and spy technologies. Racing along the tracks, you need to drift, jump on springboards, cut through air and water, and also try to elude death.

item.title: DOOMBRINGER
item.description: Game Description DOOMBRINGER is an uncompromising arena shooter, the gameplay formula of which is built on rapid movement, merciless destruction of enemies and masterful use of the arsenal. Confrontation with opponents is devoid of an element of chance, since each attack is predictable and can be prevented, which transfers all responsibility for survival to the skill of the gamer himself. The visual style refers to the classics of the genre, and the movement system with an emphasis on expressive jumping and jumping allows you to navigate the well-designed maps as efficiently as possible.

item.title: Astrodogs
item.description: Game Description Astrodogs is an arcade action game where space dogs take part in battles. The main characters will have to save the galaxy from the WOOFER company, which controls all territories and planets. Enemy dogs attack civilians, deceive ordinary workers and commit other wrong acts, because of which the ruin of the entire civilization is on the verge. The usual antics of the suspicious organization weren’t too bad until they started attacking every planet in the solar system.

item.title: ROUNDS
item.description: Game Description ROUNDS is a competitive game with several modes and numerous locations for competition. Each match takes place in a 1v1 style, where participants try to score more points or kill their opponent. In a 2D side-scrolling world, you control round characters with arms and legs. They use the elements around them or firearms to win battles. As soon as the round ends, the next, more dynamic level immediately begins.

item.title: Metal Heads
item.description: Game Description Metal Heads is a multiplayer adventure with 1 to 8 participants simultaneously in each match. Users will compete in a variety of modes, team or single matches. The gameplay features over 15 original mini-games with multiple elements, easy process and difficult to master. The project allows you to participate via a local network, on one monitor or online. Mini-games in Metal Heads: Pipemare - takes participants to a small area where they will try to survive among a dozen dangers.

item.title: pureya
item.description: Game Description pureya is a collection of pixel mini-games lasting 10 seconds. The user will go through hundreds of modes with original obstacles and goals. The location, missions and traps will change constantly. Somewhere you have to travel on a spaceship and fly around objects, or fight enemies as a powerful knight. Each arcade is controlled using two buttons. The gameplay features 2 main modes: complete passage and change every 10 seconds.

item.title: Forza Horizon 4
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 4 is a realistic racing simulator with an open game world, where the player is given the opportunity to explore many cities, participate in various races and interact with other players. Drive along the tracks of Great Britain, unlock new cars, and take part in tournaments and races. The gameplay is focused on interaction between players. To participate in certain races, you will need to find a suitable area, as well as gather all participants in one lobby.

item.title: Rhythm Doctor
item.description: Game Description Rhythm Doctor is an indie game in which you need to treat patients to the rhythm of music. The music in the game has healing properties. Each patient has unusual problems based on music theory: polyrhythms, hemiols, atonality, syncopation, etc. Rhythm Doctor helps you learn music theory through gameplay. The game contains: more than 20 levels with their own stories; each chapter is a rhythmic concept; many doctors and unique patients; single and cooperative mode; about 50 different visual effects and backgrounds.

item.title: Flipon
item.description: Game Description Flipon invites gamers to immerse themselves in a fast-paced adventure across the solar system as they join Kat and her team on a planet-spanning quest. The adventure consists of 75 levels, each of which is set against the backdrop of five unique planets, representing challenges guarded by formidable creatures. Users will have to show strategic thinking, building combinations of flip blocks and solving various puzzles. The cute opponents you meet along the way add an extra layer of challenge that makes the game lively and fun.

item.title: Maiden and Spell
item.description: Game Description Maiden and Spell is a scrolling shooter in which the main characters are girls. The user is given a choice of 8 female characters, which differ from each other not only in appearance, but also in their ability sets. The fictional universe created by indie developers is filled with magic and unusual creatures. The setting is the Kingdom of Stars, which is represented by many locations in the background, because the game has a top-down camera.

item.title: NFS Heat
item.description: Game Description Need for Speed: Heat is an arcade racing simulator with an open game world and a large selection of cars of a wide variety of brands. The plot takes place in Palm City, a fictional city very similar to sunny Miami. You will be able to ride around the city, along the coast, and also take part in stunning races. The story begins with police captain Mercer catching one of the participants in night racing, which is prohibited by law.

item.title: Singled Out
item.description: Game Description Singled Out is a test of reaction speed and observation, where the task is to accurately identify a target in a crowd. The player is presented with a kaleidoscope of eccentric creatures, but only one of them matches the three descriptive characteristics provided. An inexorable ten-second timer forces you to act as quickly as possible, because any mistake or delay leads to failure. The search process turns into an intense visual puzzle, where every second counts and extreme concentration on the smallest details of appearance is required.

item.title: Dude Simulator 3
item.description: Game Description Dude Simulator 3 is a dude simulator that is characterized by absurdity and black humor. You play the role of a “friend” who is preparing for his friend’s birthday. The day begins with you buying him a gift. Now we need to deliver it, but my friend lives in another city. You are about to go on an adventure that promises many funny and exciting moments. Gameplay Dude Simulator 3 features an open world sandbox with a unique cubic visual style.

item.title: Muse Dash
item.description: Game Description Muse Dash is a dynamic rhythm game in anime style, where you will visit many colorful locations, dance to the rhythm of fiery songs and send enemies into outer space. At the center of the story are three charismatic beauties. Having chosen one of the heroines, you need to fight with various creatures in the rhythm of the dance. The action will take place on a colorful background accompanied by dynamic dance music.

item.title: Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate Edition
item.description: Game Description Despite the average ratings for the 10th part of the franchise,Mortal Kombat 11 became a continuation of the story, and the developers tried to improve and add a lot of new things to players. The eleventh fighting game in the Mortal Kombat universe has new gameplay, plot, graphics, and character relationships that reveal the story as it progresses. We arrive in the world after the defeat of Shinnok, who was defeated by Cassie Cage.

item.title: BallisticNG
item.description: Game Description BallisticNG is a dynamic racing simulator in the setting of a sci-fi distant future, in which all available technologies have made an unprecedented leap thanks to the painstaking work of the best minds of the human race. In 2159, battles on the tracks take place in vehicles equipped with an anti-gravity unit that allows them to hover above the earthen surface. The game supports earning achievements from a pre-prepared list of 26 awards, a built-in level editor, a leaderboard, as well as modern technology - a virtual reality helmet.

item.title: Katamari Damacy REROLL
item.description: Game Description Katamari Damacy REROLL takes users to a bizarre alternative reality. The King of All Space destroys all the stars. The ruler did this not on purpose, but by accident. He instructs the Prince to correct his own mistake to see how the heir copes with the task. He flies to Earth with his father’s crazy plan. You have to play for your little son. Katamari Damacy REROLL is an improved version of the game that was released back in 2004.

item.title: FIGHTING EX LAYER
item.description: Game Description FIGHTING EX LAYER, as the name suggests, is a fighting game. The game has two types of controls - classic and progressive. The first is designed for fans of fighting, and the second is suitable for beginners. Battles take place in 2.5D in closed arenas. The gameplay of the project is reminiscent of the second or third part of SF and other virtual battles of the 90s. The super canceling mechanic allows you to abruptly cancel a combo during the attack animation in order to quickly carry out another series of attacks.

item.title: NBA 2K Playgrounds 2
item.description: Game Description NBA 2K Playgrounds 2 is a continuation of the famous basketball sports simulator. This release will feature mind-blowing modes, a considerable number of tricks and tricks, as well as more popular athletes! Speaking of them, you can choose your character from more than 400 wards. Half of them are still playing professionally in real life, the other half are world-class stars who have retired, including Kobe Bryant, Karl-Anthony Towns, Michael Jordan and others.

item.title: The Crew 2
item.description: Game Description In The Crew 2 you can ride anything, as long as you have money for this equipment. The game includes several game modes in the genre of a sports racing simulator from a third/first person: free, cooperative, career, multiplayer mode. A free race usually takes place on a separate map. We choose one unlocked vehicle element and try to win the race. In this simulator you can sail on a boat, drive a fast, high-speed car, or fly on an airplane.

item.title: DRAGON BALL FighterZ
item.description: Game Description A good, juicy anime fighting game with the Tag Team system - DRAGON BALL FighterZ - takes us on a fascinating journey through the beautiful animation of the fight itself, where “press all the buttons at once” and “use according to your abilities” are practically the same thing. The gameplay of the fighting game is, on the one hand, incredibly simple, but on the other hand, difficult and interesting if you play by the rules.

item.title: CarX Drift Racing Online
item.description: Game Description Arcade car simulatorCarX Drift Racing Online is a new word in the world of racing, where the main component is drifting! From the very beginning, you will have a huge number of opportunities that you can use in the world of real graphics and pumping up cars with modifications from famous manufacturers. From the first to the last minute in the game you will be able to upgrade your car so that it becomes a world prize-winner in the world of drifting!

item.title: Mutant Football League
item.description: Game Description Mutant Football League is a sports action simulator in which monsters and a wide variety of creatures will take to the field for sports games. You can create your own team of the most unique creatures that will be able to compete with other squads in various games. You will fight monsters, huge worms, or take part in sports games to the death. Each mission offers you a new challenge, as well as stronger enemy teams.

item.title: TEKKEN 7
item.description: Game Description TEKKEN 7 is a side-scrolling 3D fighting game that tells the true story of the Mishima clan’s feud. In the storyline we learn why Heitachi killed his wife, for what reasons Kazuya Mishima survived. The basis of the game’s action is a fighting game based on love, family relationships with friendly fights. Each battle in Tekken 7 is a separate branch in the plot, so after the end of the battle (victory in it), we see a small interactive video of the creation of the entire universe, Kazuya growing up, and the formation of the Mishima clan.

item.title: N++ (NPLUSPLUS)
item.description: Game Description N++ (NPLUSPLUS) is a dynamic indie platformer, each level of which is built using the simplest graphics possible, using many shades to create a memorable picture. The gamer is given a side view of a two-dimensional space, through which it is necessary to move a small man, shown schematically. The project uses the player’s skills to correctly and quickly assess the environment to make the most correct decisions. To perform precise and complex jumps, gamers will need skill and experience in this genre of video game entertainment.

item.title: Raiden Legacy - Steam Edition
item.description: Game Description Raiden Legacy is a collection of four arcade action games by Japanese game designer Kaihatsu Seibu. The games take place in 2090. Our planet was attacked by alien forces. The World Alliance decides to fight back and creates a special project called Raiden. You play as an experienced pilot who is the only hope for saving humanity. Arm yourself with powerful guns, board a battle shuttle and destroy a huge number of enemies.

item.title: Mushihimesama
item.description: Game Description Mushihimesama is set in a wild and unspoiled world with vast desert areas gradually turning into dense forests. Kozuyu’s arthropods, insect beasts, live here. Once they die, vegetation grows around the area where they die, creating a natural cycle of life and death. This race has the vital force of Levi-Sense, which turned out to be incredibly poisonous for people and was called miasma. Only a few inhabited areas were allowed to live, but in exchange for a little 15-year-old girl every 200 years.

item.title: Broforce
item.description: Game Description Broforce is a powerful paramilitary organization that is called upon when the world is in danger due to an excessive number of evil forces. Take control of dozens of different brothers to counter terrorist attacks and save civilians. Destroy your opponents with napalm, shooting, lightning and other various character skills. Broforce is a 2D shooter platformer with pixel graphics. You will move around locations, destroying opponents in every possible way.

item.title: Geometry Dash
item.description: Game Description Geometry Dash is a 2D arcade game aimed at hardcore level completion. You will take control of a unique character, which can be in the form of a geometric figure, to pass the most difficult levels and open up new opportunities in the gameplay. Here you will find more than 100 original and challenging missions, as well as the opportunity to create your own main character and share your results on the leaderboard.

item.title: BlazeRush
item.description: Game Description The creators of BlazeRush were clearly inspired by Blizzard’s ride-alongs that came out on consoles back in the 90s. Since that project ultimately did not reach the PC, its spiritual successor appeared a couple of decades later. The game also successfully played with the idea of ​​another racing hit of those years - “Micromachines” - in the form of a single screen for all participants in the race. The arcade action game features co-op for four people.

item.title: GRID Autosport
item.description: Game Description GRID Autosport develops a career mode and free driving in a huge number of cars, which can also be upgraded depending on your preferences. The new part of GRID is a car simulator with several game modes. Career passage is a single, story-based scenario part - this is about upgrading your driver, team of mechanics and building a reputation at the level of your driving. Here we upgrade the car and drive on 100 routes in 22 game locations, distributed according to difficulty and prestige.

item.title: One Finger Death Punch
item.description: Game Description One finger death punch is an arcade fighting game in the style of beat’em up, in which you can feel like a real martial arts master. In this game we have to fight off crowds of enemies that have surrounded the main character and are advancing from opposite sides. The game design is made in 2D, and all the characters are drawn people, which adds simplicity to the game, but at the same time makes it unusual.

item.title: Super Hexagon
item.description: Game Description Super Hexagon does not contain any plot. This is a dynamic arcade game with a top view. From the outside it looks like an endless game. But in fact, it can be passed. It will not be easy to reach the end, since the title is very hardcore. The project uses a minimalistic visual style. The gameplay is about survival in the arena. In Super Hexagon it is hexagonal in shape.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description Castle Crashers is an arcade action game in which players will take control of powerful characters and fight monsters. Create a squad by choosing from 25 characters to fight your way through castles against your enemies. Compete with other users or monsters living throughout the continent. The plot will unfold at a ball in the king’s castle. During the fun, an evil sorcerer stole a precious magic stone and four princesses, who must be rescued by the knights and fight the enemy.

item.title: Coven
item.description: Game Description Going to the gloomy world ofCoven, you have to deal with a large number of enemy creatures and deal with their elimination. The universe takes you into an atmospheric medieval fantasy world, where witches and other mythical creatures live alongside people. The first episode is available in the game, where you will take on the role of a young girl. The heroine is burned at the stake during the 1600s, mistaken for a witch and a fiend.

item.title: Follow me
item.description: Game Description Follow Me is a charming 2D platformer that takes you on an exciting adventure through a huge and colorful world. The plot revolves around a curious little white rabbit who goes on a journey to discover what lies behind a mysterious door. Game mechanics focus on exploration and interaction with other characters. The world is full of both friendly and hostile creatures, and you need to use your wits and skills to navigate various locations and solve puzzles.

item.title: Half-Life 2D: Block Mesa
item.description: Game Description Half-Life 2D: Block Mesa is a two-dimensional remake of the original Half-Life. The story also begins with a laboratory where another experiment was to take place. There were no signs of trouble until a powerful explosion occurred right before your eyes. Alien entities have infiltrated from the world of Zen, a military detachment is trying to rectify the situation, but it is becoming more and more difficult every minute.

item.title: Wanderburg
item.description: Game Description Wanderburg is an open-world roguelike that places gamers at the center of a brutal ecosystem where entire castles on wheels move across procedurally generated lands. Each such stronghold is a predator, preying on weaker competitors and absorbing everything in its path for its own strengthening. The setting is filled with anachronistic technology, such as knights on motorcycles and steam-powered siege engines, which creates a unique atmosphere of the absurd Middle Ages.
